Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Binary decision to include a feature in the upcoming release.

Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: Assign a user story to the current sprint.

Name: activate_task
Description: Select a task for implementation this sprint.

Name: allocate_budget_project
Description: Amount of budget allocated to the project in this planning cycle.

Name: set_story_priority_adjustment
Description: Integer adjustment applied to user story priority.

Name: team_capacity_reserved_points
Description: Story points reserved for the team this sprint.

Name: set_sprint_goal_focus
Description: Categorical encoding for chosen sprint goal focus area.

Name: staff_availability_override
Description: Override factor applied to worker availability for planning.

Name: select_blocker_fix_now
Description: Immediate fix decision for a given blocker.

Name: enable_ci_stage_deploy
Description: Toggle deployment to a given environment in CI/CD.

Name: number_of_review_attendees_target
Description: Target number of attendees for sprint review invites.

Name: set_release_batch_size
Description: Number of features batched into the next release.

Name: limit_backlog_entries_visible
Description: Cap of visible entries to enforce focus during refinement.
